summary.span: O namespace contém as classes necessárias para a criação e o uso de serviços que podem ser descobertos.

span.span: The namespace contains the classes required for the creation and use of discoverable services.

summary.span: Essas classes implementam o protocolo WS-Discovery para a WCF (Windows Communication Foundation).

span.span: These classes implement the WS-Discovery protocol for Windows Communication Foundation (WCF).
